amendment.description: Page 58, after line 25, insert the following: SEC. 242. Not later than 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act, ***.

action.text: Mr. Dent raised a point of order against the Benishek amendment (A014). Mr. Dent stated that the amendment seeks to change existing law and constitutes legislation in an appropriations bill The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Benishek.
